name: gbf-raider_skin_v1.08
description:
神サイトに感謝。(2.03動作確認済み)

現状出来ること:
 ・非表示設定:ツイッター/メッセージ項目/検索フィールド
 ・表示制御:最新行制御/最小向けスタイル(+日付強制表示)/コピーボタン表示位置調整
**1.02(2016/12/05更新)以前の人は一度更新(update)して下さい。**
additional_info:
**Me japanese, not good at english. I sorry for my poor english**

I very thank you for the useful web "gbf-raider 2.0" <3

what this style can do :
-hide twitter
-hide message
-hide search field
-limit entries(active-rows)
-some customized style add(private useX)

**2016/01/24 add
I checked version 2.3 of gbf-raider, seems most of styles working fine, I suppose.
If you find any bugs with the styles that I created, please let me know.

**2016/12/05 add
omg! translated version released from version 2.1 <3
I thank for the great update! thank you @GranTidesson(website producer) and @GaiB_RareCoil(translator)!


**Release notes**

ver1.00
-released

ver1.01
-add "search field visible"
-add tabs(6-10,15 and 20) in "active-row"

ver1.02(2016/12/05)
*update required*
-supported japanese site(http://jp.gbf-raider.com/)
-operation check for my style at gbf-raider 2.1

ver1.03(2016/12/05)
-add style for friend.(jp only?)

ver1.04(2016/12/05)
-twitter mode fix.

ver1.05(2016/12/05)
-supported english site(http://en.gbf-raider.com/)
-renamed the name of this style.

ver1.06(2016/12/06)
-date_visible mode add. It created for "private use1" users(date_visible)

ver1.07(2016/12/07)
-screen-shots updated.
-a mode of "private use2" has been removed:D

ver1.08(2016/12/08)
-add copy_fix.

style_setting_options.label: 非表示(hide)Default
style_setting_options.value:
table tr td:nth-child(2){display:none;}
table tr th:nth-child(2){display:none;}
